title: ONT GIS CONFIGURATION COMMAND
description:
This command allows the operator to configure the ONT GIS parameters.

olt-location - when default value disable is set, OLT won't care about ONT GIS 
info, when enable is set, OLT would provison OLT's location to ONT
user_level:
The command can be accessed by operators with equipment privileges, and 
executed by operators with equipment privileges.
syntax: > configure equipment ont gis (ont-idx) [ no olt-location | olt-location <Gpon::OltLocation> ]

command_parameters.name: [no] olt-location
command_parameters.description: GIS settings for this ONT optional parameter with default value: "disable"
values: disable               : the OLT GIS info will not be used
enable                : the OLT GIS info will be used

raw:
help configure equipment ont gis
ONT GIS CONFIGURATION COMMAND
=============================

Command Description
-------------------

This command allows the operator to configure the ONT GIS parameters.

olt-location - when default value disable is set, OLT won't care about ONT GIS 
info, when enable is set, OLT would provison OLT's location to ONT


User Level
----------

The command can be accessed by operators with equipment privileges, and 
executed by operators with equipment privileges.

Command Syntax
--------------

The command has the following syntax:
> configure equipment ont gis (ont-idx) [ no olt-location | olt-location 
<Gpon::OltLocation> ]

Command Parameters
------------------

Table "ONT GIS Configuration Command" Resource Parameters

Resource Identifier        Description

(ont-idx)                  ONT index

Table "ONT GIS Configuration Command" Command Parameters

Parameter                  Description

[no] olt-location          GIS settings for this ONT
                           optional parameter with default value: "disable"

                           Parameter type: <Gpon::OltLocation>
                           Format:
                           ( disable
                           | enable )
                           Possible values:
                           - disable               : the OLT GIS info will not 
be used
                           - enable                : the OLT GIS info will be 
used


DS-LIN-TEST-01:automationuser>#
